name: Outsized
description: Outsized is a talent-on-demand platform for large enterprise clients and consulting firms in Asia-Pacific, Africa, and the Middle East. Our focus is on full-time contracts (remote or onsite), typically between 1-12 months. Our clients use us for a broad range of flexible talent needs. Recent examples include digital transformation specialists, project & programme managers, strategy consultants, data scientists, actuaries, innovation consultants, agile coaches, and business analysts. We help our talent upskill so they have better chances of landing their dream projects and charge fair rates. In addition, our members have access to an exclusive Community where they can connect with peers and experts, take part in live events, and find project collaborators. We care about our clients AND our talent. Thus, not only do we make sure our ecosystem members are great at what they do, but we also take pride in only working with fantastic clients who treat independent talent fairly.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Independent talent for enterprise clients and consulting firms in Asia-Pacific, Africa, and the Middle East.
ShortDescription: Outsized is a talent-on-demand platform for large enterprise clients and consulting firms in Asia-Pacific, Africa, and the Middle East. Our focus is on full-time contracts (remote or onsite), typically between 1-12 months.
enhanced_description: Outsized is a specialized talent-on-demand platform connecting large enterprise clients and consulting firms with independent professionals across Asia-Pacific, Africa, and the Middle East. The platform focuses on facilitating full-time contracts, which can be remote or onsite, typically ranging from 1 to 12 months. Outsized caters to a diverse set of flexible talent needs, providing specialists in areas such as digital transformation, project and programme management, strategy consulting, data science, actuarial science, innovation consulting, agile coaching, and business analysis. Beyond matching, Outsized actively supports its talent by providing upskilling opportunities to enhance their project prospects and ensuring they can charge fair rates. Furthermore, the platform fosters an exclusive Community for its members, enabling networking with peers and experts, participation in live events, and collaboration on projects. A core value is to ensure positive relationships, meticulously selecting clients who are committed to treating independent talent fairly.
key_use_cases: Hiring flexible talent for short-to-mid-term projects (1-12 months)
Accelerating talent acquisition for specialized roles
Accessing a vetted pool of independent professionals
competitive_advantages: Specialized focus on large enterprise clients and consulting firms in Asia-Pacific, Africa, and the Middle East.
Emphasis on full-time contracts (remote or onsite) typically between 1-12 months.
Dedicated talent upskilling programs for independent professionals.
Exclusive community for talent to connect, learn, and collaborate.
Commitment to ensuring fair treatment of independent talent by clients.
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Improved access to specialized, pre-vetted independent professionals
Enhanced talent engagement and retention for independent professionals
Reduced recruitment effort for flexible talent needs
